title: Week 15 Preview
description:
Jason Fitz, Jim Mora, and David Pollack discuss key matchups across college football and under the radar storylines. Also the crew discuss the long term impact of Boston College's decision to not play a bowl game.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew previews key week 15 matchups.
